hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #under the icy waters# lies #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that within the #valley#, the crate and waterfall conceal...^ #a Green Rupee# and #a Green Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Happy Mask Shop#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #a Hookshot# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Trail## has #0# major items.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple Central Bow Target Chest

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #3# major items.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Red Rupee# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

LH (Lab).text: Ganondorf used to be an adventurer like me, but then he took a light arrow to the knee.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides #Know-It-All Brothers' House#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Hylian Shield#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #a Wallet# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: If you see something suspicious, bomb it!

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Invisible Blades Visible Chest

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #flames in the royal tomb# reveal #a Red Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that those who seek #sunken silver rupees# will find #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground MQ Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs #Granny's Potion Shop#.
